actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for increases in authorization ceilings for land acquisition and development in certain units of the National Park System, for operation of the Volunteers in the Parks Program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the authorization of appropriations for the acquisition of lands, interests, and development within certain units of the National Park System, and for the operation of the Volunteer Parks Program.

titles.title: A bill to provide for increases in authorization ceilings for land acquisition and development in certain units of the National Park System, for operation of the Volunteers in the Parks Program, and for other purposes.
